p: Alpha-1-antitrypsin (A1AT), 4-(2-aminomethyl)-benzene-sulfonyl fluoride (AEBSF), Camostat mesylate, Nafamostat and Bromhexine hydrochloride are the best experimentally validated inhibitors of TMPRSS2, as it results from in vitro cell experiments and computational approaches [64], [66], [91], [19], [20], [92].
